thread.title: AL.com All-Access: Why does John Calipari make more money than Nick Saban?
thread.title_full: AL.com All-Access: Why does John Calipari make more money than Nick Saban?

author: Creg Stephenson | cstephenson@al.com
title: AL.com All-Access: Why does John Calipari make more money than Nick Saban?
text: The new deal also raised his yearly salary to $8 million beginning in 2018-19, a figure that is higher than all but a handful of NBA coaches. It's also significantly higher than that of Alabama football coach Nick Saban, who makes a shade under $7 million (not counting bonuses) in a deal that will carry him through the 2021 season.
